VLIB Function Reference

ReLU and MaxPooling operations

Introduction

Rectified Linear Unit(ReLU) and MaxPooling operations are part of CNN bulding blocks.


MaxPooling operation here performs a 2x2 downsampling operation selecting the maximum of the four elements.

ReLU applies elementwise activation function as shown below: 
                                      f(x) = max(0,x);
ReLU leaves the size of the input as unchanged.

Specification

Function

Performs 2x2 ReLU and MaxPooling operations on N 32-bit input channels each of having W x H 32-bit inputs producing N 32-bit output channels each of having W/2 x H/2 16-bit outputs after a round and shift operation.

API

  • VLIB_ReLU_MaxPooling_2x2_skip2_tile
